title: Avocado-baked Eggs
directions: Prepare the avocados and preheat the oven to 425 degrees.
Halve your avocado, remove the pit, and then use a spoon to widen the hole where the pit was. This leaves more room for your egg.
Try to get the yolk in first and then fill the rest of the space with the white. My avocado wasn't big enough to fit all of the egg white.
Add your cheese(s), salt, and pepper
Some recipes said to add the cheese and toppings toward the end of the baking, but I added mine at the start and it worked out well.
Add additional toppings, and bake for about 15.
ingredients: 1 avocado, 2 eggs, salt, pepper, cheese (I used shredded cheddar and crumbled feta), assorted herbs (basil/chives/etc.). I wanted to add some kind of meat, so I used a cheese grater to shred some black pepper salami. I could see some cut up bacon being really good too.
